# DateTimeOffsetUtility.Max method

Returns the larger of two DateTimeOffset instances.

```csharp
public static DateTimeOffset Max(DateTimeOffset date1, DateTimeOffset date2)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| date1 | The first of two dates to compare. |
| date2 | The second of two dates to compare. |

## Return Value

The larger of date1 or date2.
